Replies.Reply: October 18th, 2007    IN THE BEGINNING...       1   BLACK an infinite void but at the center a SINGULARITY, a particle infinitely small and infinitely dense that contains all the potential matter and energy in the universe.
What should we eat?
You know what I'd really like?
Some fruit.
No.
Nuh-uh.
Nope.
That one.
Why not?
Why not?
Why not?
So do you always follow the rules?
Okay, fine. We won't. Forget I mentioned it. I understand if you're afraid--

No, really, it's all right. I just thought you might be curious why we can eat everything else that walks, crawls, swims, flies, or grows in the ground, but not that particular fruit. And I thought you might be the kind of man who's willing to take a chance and start thinking for himself, but I guess I was wrong.
You first.
We both bite at the same time.
So you're saying it's not good?
Ooh, banana!
Thank you, Marlak.
Zed, just admit it. You're just making it harder on yourself.
Well, after the fire--
Hey!
How do you know God's a "He?"
You think we've been chosen by God?
I want to trust you.
For you maybe.
So does everybody else.
The Princess wishes to see you.
Not you. Him.
The two of you follow me.
This is Zaftig the Eunuch. You go with him.
As you wish.
Be sure to try the fruit.
I had no choice. I'm a slave, remember?
Wait here until you're sent for.
Of course not. You were just chosen again. Maybe after you and the Princess get together you can start thinking about someone beside yourself.
She wants to see you-- now.
Why would I think that? Just because you couldn't take your eyes off her--
What's your plan?
Forget it.
The Princess awaits you.
Good luck.
She sees him and starts to revive.
Zed!
You're incredible, you know that?
Where will you go now?
Are you going alone?
I'll get my things.
The Princess gave me a few gifts when she freed us.
That's west.
What?
Yeah, fruit's good.
You want an apple or a pear?
Orange? Tangerine?
Umm, mango? Kiwi? Peach?
Plum? Nectarine? Passion fruit?
Okay, don't tell me-- papaya?
Watermelon? Honeydew? Grapes?
Starfruit, casaba-- tangelo?
Replies.Didascalie: (this is a lot of work to get laid)

Replies.Reply: Okay, I give up. Which fruit do you want?
Yeah, right. Okay.
Because that's the fruit we don't eat! It's forbidden.
Because we don't! It's a rule!
Stop saying why not! I told you--
No-- yeah-- I don't know. We don't have that many rules. In fact, we only have one rule-- DON'T EAT THAT  FRUIT.
I'm not "afraid"--
Okay! Fine! You want to try the Good and Evil fruit, you got it.
No way! It was your idea. You go first.
Okay. Ready? One-- two-- three!
Got me. That's a good move. I'm going to steal it.
Yuchh! That's horrible. Yecch, ptui! Ughh.
Yes! I'm saying it's not good!
Oh, no--
Do me a favor. Just kill me.
I couldn't help myself! Maya was just staring at me with those pouty eyes-- and those perky breasts--
Hey! Squanto! Give me a break, would ya'! You got the whole forest!
Why does everyone have to crap right behind my hut?
I don't see it. I mean she's cute, but I don't think I'd lay with her.
which was a big mistake. I see that now. You think it won't be awkward the next morning but--
So you give her a little tap on the head. Women respond to that--
I wouldn't read too much into that.
Okay, that might mean something.
Yes, Marlak. Very observant. I was indisposed. Got that intestinal thing that's been going around.
It's a bear.
It's not a real bear. It's a "representation" of a bear. You know, a "picture."
Yeah. Like you'd know.
That-- would be an antelope-- or a deer-- a deerpalope.
How could it be Maya? It's just some lines on a skin.
Your woman? I'm not sure dragging her into the bushes kicking and screaming means you have an actual "thing" going.
Hey! Nice supra-orbital ridge, fartface!
Hey, Oh? Did it ever occur to you that there may be more to life than this?
No,                                                            I'm serious.We're born into thisworld, we hunt, we gather, we eat,we sleep, we make babies--
--but why? What's the point?
No. Last night I couldn't sleep, so I just laid there looking up at the sky, counting the stars. There were over seventy. Kinda makes you think, doesn't it?
Really? I've been thinking about it ever since I ate that fruit.
But what if it doesn't? What if it just goes on and on forever? Or what if it's round?
Sorry!
Do it, man! Go dance for her.
Are you kidding? Go! Jackal Dance!
Excuse me, hunter coming through.
For your information I was in line and I just stepped out to chew some food for an elderly lady.
Oh, really? And what if I called Enmebaragesi a liar?
Calm down. I said "what                                     if"-- it was a hypothetical.
No, you just made it harder on myself!
Okay, fine, you got me.
Maya and I lay together on occasion. We're consenting adults and we have an adventurous sexual relationship.
Isn't that what we're talking about?
Oh, that! Yeah! I did eat the fruit. I was just kidding about humping Maya.
Look, Marlak, this is crazy.
One bite! What's the big deal?
I've always had trouble with the Great Turtle Theory-- too many unexplained gaps.
Really? How screwed? Like I knew it was a rule but I'm a little fuzzy on the exact details.
Where am I supposed to go?
Oh, really?

Am I detecting a little jealousy here because I now have the knowledge of good and evil and you don't? Well, you know what? I say what I did was a good thing-- a very very good thing-- and I'm not leaving. What do you think of that?
Okay, is that supposed to be funny?
I don't want to seem ungrateful or anything, but you wouldn't happen to have any arrows, would you?
Okay, but before I go I just want to say something. I know I'm not the greatest hunter--
Yes, or gatherer-- but there's got to be more to life than this--
Kinda hard to concentrate with that rhythmic drumming, fellas.
Anyways, I'm going away, not because you're forcing me to--
I don't know where we're going or when we're going to get there, but I will lead the way--
lighting up the darkness-- pointing us in the right direction, and keeping us entertained with humorous anecdotes from my childhood. Now who's with me?
Oops!
I know there's a lesson in here somewhere. Any thoughts?
No, you don't.
How can you see me if I'm not here?
Okay, then tell me this-- who's standing right behind you?
Was it my speech?
But the speech was pretty good, right? I mean, even I was moved and I was the one speaking.
This is nice, out here, the two of us.
Come on, those hunters are idiots.

You know what we should do? You and me should kill the biggest boar ever-- just huge!-- and take it back to the village. Just to show them. And we won't let anyone else eat it. They'll have to watch us eat it.
Fine, we'll just start with something small. A squirrel or something.
Yeah, like it's so hard to build a new hut. It's just a pile of sticks and dung--
Oh!
Don't move a muscle.
I don't know. There's two different opinions on this one.
I'm going to-- RUN!
You really should put some maggots on those scratches. They look pretty deep.
Because I honestly thought he'd go for me. I thought I was doing you a favor. Apparently not appreciated.
You didn't have to come with me, you know. I didn't ask you to come.
Yes, that's a technique of public speaking, but I didn't ask you specifically. You chose to come.
You making your own fire?
You're still coming?
I knew it! Still think you're just gonna fall off the edge of the world?
Oooh.                                                           -
I'll go around! Wait for me!
Say what you want, but that was no accident. You don't see a pattern here?
People-- more than one-- walking--
that way.
Yes! There!
Four men, maybe five. And a child--
Looks like they had some nuts--
This one's mine.
We're gonna need some arrowheads.
Yeah, well-- we're hunters.
What do you guys do?
Hey! Easy!
Okay, boys, that's enough. We just want to--
We're not really that insulted--
Boys, boys! You're brothers!
Just let them settle it.
I guess that settles it.
Nothing!
Hey! What do you mean "we"? I don't want to play the blame game, but you're the one who hit him.
We didn't know you were going to kill him--
Did I say that?
Why even bring it up?
Unfortunately we already have dinner plans.
What are the big round things for?
Wow! That is like the greatest invention since the vagina.
Thanks, but I'm kind of staying away from fruit for the time being.
Yeah, that's got to be pretty vexing.
Wow. That's kind of a downer isn't it?
Boy, I hope not.
I'm waiting for the punchline.
Yeah, there you go.
Oh looks at Seth.
And that's a good way to be. In fact, I'm kind of surprised a pretty girl like you is sleeping alone anyway. I would've thought guys would be lined up at the door.
Maybe you just haven't met the right one.
So we have that in common--
I don't even know what that means.
I'm really not getting this.
Replies.Didascalie: (stares at her for a long  MOMENT)

Replies.Reply: Why would they blame us?
Look at all these people! And this stuff!
Yeah, we're gonna need money.
What's money?
It's Marlak!
Eema! Maya!
What happened? How did you get here?
Yeah, this one looks pretty good--
Well, that depends on what you mean by money?
You still think it's all just a coincidence?                                                All of us here right now, at this particular place, at this particular time?
I'm not sure yet, but I'm starting to believe that everything happens for a reason. Like, why did I eat the forbidden fruit?
What do you mean "which" omnipotent force? How many omnipotent forces could there be?
Work with me-- I'm just speculating here. Let's call this force "God"; and let's say this "God" is controlling everything. Maybe God wanted me to have the knowledge of good and evil.
Don't you get what I'm saying?
Well, no offense, but it's possible that I was chosen and you all just happened to be there.
A chosen doesn't need to be strong.
Not my face, my brain. It's enormous. I'm the smartest guy in the village.
What?!
Which one of us is smarter?
Oh yeah, then why are we free and you're chained up?
Sit tight. I'm going to get you out of here. Do you trust me?
Fair enough.
Good work. What's the deal?
I never trusted that guy.
It's not like I want to be a slave or anything, but this is embarrassing!
Come on, people! We're a steal at thirty!
Hey, pal! You can take your foot out of my ass anytime now.
And your foot is still there. If I turn around, you will be sorry.
That's better.
Look, I want you to know I blame myself for everything that happened.
I don't think that's going to be possible. And I told you before, she's not "your woman."
Ecchhh!
I'd like to see you try.
I wonder who they are. Their hats are really great, aren't they?
It wasn't my very first thought, but I'd be lying if I said it wasn't up there.
Now we just need to figure out a way to rescue Maya and Eema.
Patience, my friend. Even killers have to sleep sometime.
Well, that was refreshing. How'd you sleep?
Shit!
I have no idea.

Will you stop being so negative? I got your back, man. Who saved you from those lions when you were a baby? They were going to pounce, had you surrounded. Took the mama lion-- BAM!-- kneed her right in the face. Papa lion comes flying at me-- BAM!-- dropped an elbow, knocked his ass out.
Took his legs-- THWOOM!-- tossed him in the river. And the rest just ran off.
Yeah, because nobody else was there. You're lucky I was walking by.
Okay, it's possible I dreamed that--
We've got to keep moving.
I've got you, buddy-- just like always.
STOP!
What are you doing to that kid?
What do you mean, nothing? You were just going to kill him!
Not to him, I'm guessing.
What do you think?
Whatever you just said.
I am Zed and this is Oh, sons of--
Sodom and Gomorrah? Never been there. But I've heard of them.
i didn't know that. What kind of abomination are we talking about?
Abominable.
Really. Tell me more.
We just want to know so we can avoid them.
When do you think all this smiting is going to go down? We may have some friends there.
Abraham, I'm a little worried about the city being destroyed.
This is all your land?
His name is praise and love his whole graciousness--
I'm not sure I have any extra.

You know, Abe, it's late, and we've all had a lot to drink, and I know this whole foreskin thing sounds like a good idea now, but you may just want to sleep on it. we could always cut 'em off in the morning, but if we do it now, there's just no putting it back on later.
To the city. I have to find Maya.
And you're going to listen to him?
Yes, and he also wanted to give his dick a little trim.
You don't even know where we're going.
No. Your dad specifically said Sodom and Gomorrah were evil.
No! I told you, that's not where we're going.
Fine.
Okay, you win. Take us to Sodom.
I knew it was right around here.
You shouldn't be smoking either.
Where? Back to the penis-cutter?
Get help! Tell your father!
I kinda get why his dad wanted to kill him.
We're not really Hebrews--
Okay. Lesson learned. No talking.
Hey! Why don't you pick on someone your own size?
Which would be difficult since there are probably very few people around who actually are your size--
Relatively fat one. I wouldn't be talking about fat, if I were you.
Right. Enough said.
All right, honestly? You did sell us into slavery.
That was way less than a fortnight.
Check out that woman across the street! She's looking at us.
This is great! How do I look?
So is this it? We just walk around?
What kind of trouble?
Pretty harsh, isn't it?
Did you see that girl? I think she liked me! She looked right at me.
Who was she?
Why not?
Will she be there?
Hey, there she is!
He makes his way to a position just below the royal pavilion and stares up at the Princess Inanna.
What's happening?
What do they want a virgin for?
Why?
Seems like a waste of a perfectly good virgin to me.
This is just crazy.
Me? Cool.
We're kind of a package deal. Can he come with?
I'll try to put in a good word for you.
What do you think, ponytail or no ponytail? You know what?
I'll start with the ponytail, see where the night takes me.
Hey, you made it! What's it like inside?
Look, first of all, we're not actually brothers---
Hey! You didn't let me finish. As soon as I get in there I'm going to talk to somebody and get you invited, okay?
Feels like a hair-down kinda scene, don't you think?
Maya?! What are you doing here?
I was going to rescue you! Really!
This wasn't my idea, you know.
Hey! You're a real girl! That is so cool.
Amazing!
Oh?
Yeah, you look so-- gold. How's it going?
Not bad. Had a little rub and a scrub, now I'm up for some grub.
Hey! You'll never guess who's here-
You! Slave girl!
I told you to fetch me more wine!
Now go-- fetch! Wait by that--
Slaves-- what are you gonna do?
Ouch. Helpful hint. I will keep that in mind.
Keep that up and you will.

Okay, I know what you're thinking, but I'm just checking it out. We kept hearing that this place was so evil, but now that I look around I'm thinking maybe it's not all bad. There's a lot to learn here.
No! Like the wheel, for instance!
Look, I think I've been chosen to do something great with my life--
--and I don't think it's hunting wild pigs and weaving baskets.
I hope you don't think I'm interested in her.
I'm just using her, Maya! It's part of my plan. I'm going to get you all out of here as soon as I can.
It's a secret.
And I await her.
You two await me.
Stay out of trouble. I'll be back.
I didn't know it was so close.
Looks pretty from up here, but some people think God is going to wipe them out because they're so evil.
I don't really know you. But you don't look evil.
Well, yeah. I think you're--
No, you're perfect. Your face, your hair--
Your eyes are like the sea.
Well, it's kinda dark. I took a shot. I know they're big, though--
Can I ask you one thing? What would a girl like you want with a guy like me?
That's exactly what I've been thinking! You wouldn't believe the things that have been happening to me lately. I just didn't know why.
I couldn't agree more. I'm trying to agree more, but I can't. That's how much I agree.
What are we doing here?
Yes! Finally. Now you're talking!
The Gods are in there?
Then why am I going in?
Right-- right. Then again, if the rules say--
What is it with chicks always wanting guys to break the rules?
I'm going in.
Thank you, O-- Merciful ones, for--
Replies.Didascalie: (takes a deep breath and starts improvising)

Replies.Reply: Okay, I don't know the right words--
Look, I know you think this place is evil and it kinda is-- I see that-- but that's not everybody.
Hello? A little help? Am I getting warm here? Okay, is it me?
Okay, wait. Is that the sign? The silence? Is that it?
It is, isn't it! Just this really silent-- silence.

You're not going to tell me what to do; it's up to me to decide what's right and what's wrong-- right? Is that it? You're not going to speak to me-- you're going to speak through me? If that's right, don't say anything.
Okay, I read you loud and clear.
I was just looking for the bathroom.
I wish I was upside down. Looks fun.
So this is it? We're not friends anymore? After all I've done for you?
I've helped you come out of your shell.
Listen, I know I'm not perfect, and I may have made a few wrong turns, but you have to understand-- I'm a chosen. That's a lot of responsibility -- you can't even imagine.
Okay, be mad, but I'm going to get us out of here, if it's the last thing I do.
That was just my first idea-- and I'm also accepting ideas.
Oh, come on!
I just want to say this is really messed up--
Can I make a suggestion?
Why don't you just pick one person to throw?
In fact, don't you think it would be fair for us to get to pick the person who stones us?
We pick him!
No, next to him!
So? You got something against kids?
This guy hates kids!
Good thinking, huh?
Holy shit! That kid's got an arm!
Wait! I have a question for the King!
Why didn't I die in the Holy of Holies?
I entered the Holy of Holies and, lo, I did not die! Why? Because I am chosen by the Gods!
Yes!
Hey! Boys! Long time no see.
Don't tell me you're still mad about Maya. That's so over. I have a thing going with the princess now-- well, almost had a thing. I'm a slave now-- just like you.
Okay. We do have our differences--
You know, I'd like to, but I did something to my neck--
I must've slept on it funny-- those dungeon pillows are like rocks--
Okay! But I should tell you, this isn't really my area. I'm just on a break from the mud department--
Okay, okay. I'm going.
Okay, boys, on the count of three.
Learned that from Maya. Good trick, huh? Okay, together this time. Go!
How high you guys think we're going with this?
That's ambitious.
That's nothing. You should see it when I'm excited.
Oh, right, the tower. Incredible erection.
You're from the village, aren't you?
I bet you wish you were back there right now, don't you.
Well, don't give up. You're going to get home someday.
How are you seeing that far?
It's Maya!
I have to get down there.
Over my dead body.
Wow. Who saw that coming?
Lower me down.
He's descending rapidly, rappelling off the side of the ziggurat. He looks up, expecting Marlak to belay him and slow him down.
Any time now, Marlak!
I don't think so!
Whatever that last thing you said was.
Let her go.
Why don't we just sacrifice something small-- a rabbit maybe.
I'm the, uh, Chosen One, I guess, and on behalf of, well, the whole city, I want to thank the High Priest for his incredible sacrifice. That was really something, wasn't it?
People! Friends! Sodomites!

Was that a sign from God? Wasn't it a sign? What's the deal? We all want to know. But I'm not sure anybody really knows-- and I'd be real suspicious of people who say they do. If I've learned one thing, it's this: the world and everything in it is a miracle. And what that miracle means is for each and every one of us to figure out for himself. Are the Gods going to destroy us? Maybe-- I don't know--
That's what I've been trying to tell you.
Well said, Marlak. You really have a way with words.
Not much to tell, is there? Just an average guy who saw his destiny and had the courage to defy a powerful empire. No big deal.
Everybody ready?
Might head down to Egypt. I hear it's a happening kinda place.
Not necessarily. You want to come?
Traveling light, huh? Okay, here we go.
To the west!
I knew that. Just wanted to see if you did.
The game is no longer cute but he still plays along.
For you.
You didn't hunt today.
What's that supposed to be?
That's not a bear. That's just some lines on a skin.
That's stupid.
And what's that?
It looks like Maya.
Replies.Didascalie: (trying to look at it upside down)

Replies.Reply: Stay away from my woman.
Stay away.
Enmebaragesi said he saw you in the garden with Maya.
Enmebaragesi doesn't lie.
The truth!
You laid with my woman?
Your father was a great hunter, but you're like-- a girl.
Now I kill you.
Now you die.
I see you.
Yes, I do.
You're trying to trick me.
You think I'm going to turn around and look, but I'm not.
I'm going to gut you like a pig.
Get away from my woman!
I'll kill you!
No. You're not just like me.
Who's going to take her there? The Chosen One?
All right.
Now what?
All hail the Chosen One!
You did good.
We'll tell stories about you around the fire.

Look at them. Hunters think they're so cool. They don't think gathering is dangerous? There are thorns-- bees-- those big stingy ants. I could hunt-- I just don't want to. And what's with the blood on their faces? They think that's sanitary?
Why did you eat that fruit? It's forbidden. Everybody knows that.
I think, and I could be wrong, that all the poop makes the ground more fertile, which in turn, gives the leaves in the area a softer feel.
Hi, Eema!
She doesn't even know I exist.
Of course not! She's your sister!
My hut's a mess. And what if she struggles?
No. She only likes hunters-- not gatherers.
Okay, I think somebody's had enough.
You make babies--
You always get like this when you smoke.
No.
There's nothing on the other side of the mountains. Everybody knows that. The world just ends. You'd fall right off the edge.
Oh, yeah, that's plausible.
Will you stop with that crazy talk?
You think? They're playing the Jackal Dance. I don't do that one so well.
Hey! What's going on?
Oooh, shooting star.
I guess I'm with you.
No, the fire. I lost everything.
Can we talk about this later?
Yeah, it's great.
I don't think they'll forget the fire.
If it's that huge how would we carry it back?
Yeah, we'll make everyone watch us eat a squirrel. Will you get real?
You're a pile of sticks and dung.
What are you doing?
Will that work?
What are you going to do?
I just want to know why you told me not to move, and you ran.
Yeah, big favor.
Yes, you did! You looked right at me-- twice.
No, eat your weasel. You deserve it.
No, arrows. We're going to need them.
Yes.
Incredible.
I see a pattern. Every time something terrible can happen to me, it does.
You think? There's about a thousand footprints here.
No, thank you.
Okay.
Okay! Enough! Can we just go?
He's a hunter. I'm more of a "maker." I made this loincloth, I do arrows-- I made a shelf unit for my hut--
Shouldn't we do something?
Probably just tuckered out from the fight.
Right! You were holding the rock and he-- accidentally ran into it--
Oh, yeah, people could so easily misinterpret that.
why don't we go with you?
Hey! What about me?
That's really good.
Do I have to?
Your brother Seth is an interesting guy. Did you know he can put his penis in his mouth?
Can I have one of those?
Ow!
Hi, Eema.
Are you all right? Did they-- rape you?
What an amazing coincidence--
I don't know. Why do you think?
To get laid?
which omnipotent force?
I don't know! What's "omnipotent"
Why would he want that?
Why would God choose you? Why wouldn't he choose Marlak? He's stronger.
You do have a fat face.
You're not even-- I'm smarter than you!
Why? Just 'cause he murdered his brother and got hit by lightning?
They probably don't know how smart you think you are.
Excuse me-- I'm sorry--
That's not good--
Replies.Didascalie: (his hand gets stuck between her breasts)

Replies.Reply: Hold on! I'm coming!
Their hats? I'm sorry, but when that one guy cut the other guy's head off, my first thought wasn't, "Gee, what a great hat."
How are we going to rescue anybody?
Not that well. I think I was over-
Now where do we go?
Why do I listen to you? Now we're going to starve to death or die of thirst.
You know, I've asked people about that and no one else seems to remember it.
He was a small man.
Are they nice?
And where exactly are those cities?
--of his wealthy bounty.
Couldn't we could just get our ears pierced?
You have any idea where we're going?
The city! He said God's going to smite them with holy fire!
He seemed to know what he was talking about.
Gee, they're not open. We should probably come back later.
Me? Why do I have to knock? What if we're waking somebody up? Let's just get out of here.
Meaner than this?
Don't have to wait 'til morning.
Yeah, thanks for saving us. What are you going to do to us now?
We are so in! She's eye-knowing us like crazy.
Well, I kind of have a girlfriend--
Sorry.
You look good, but I think my hat's too big.
Do you happen to know where I could get a smaller hat?
You can't blame people for being hungry.
Gee, I wonder why?
Where's everybody going?
You throw the virgin in the fire so it'll rain?
These virgins-- it's always a girl, right?
Can't I go with him?
Hah! No? That would be weird.
So what do you do?
You've been living here since you were nine?
I should look into that. How do you get to be a eunuch?
What?! What's up with all the genital mutilation?
No, I'd miss them-- I'm sure. I hardly got to use them yet.
I'm not supposed to talk. I'm a statue.
How's it going? I just had my whole body painted by a fat guy with no balls, and believe me, he was very thorough, if you know what I mean. How's it going with you?
That sounds nice-- for you.
There's Eema!
I haven't joined anything.
Does this look like fun?
What? Like human sacrifice?
Here we go again--
I don't know. So much has happened. Sometimes I think--
I love you.
I'd rather not, if you don't mind.
Are those my choices?
How's that?
That enough?
Replies.Didascalie: (splashes a few more drops on him)

Replies.Reply: With my hands?
Eema! This isn't what you think.
No, really! I'm just-- rubbing oil on this man.
Ughh.
That's so-- unselfish of you.
So where does that hall lead to?
Wow.
So who cleans it?
No, of course not.
Kind of makes you wonder though--
Yeah, that's probably it.
So you're saying we can't go in?
Right, right, right.
What if we just open the doors and stick our heads in?
Seize him!

What have you done for me? I've been attacked by a cougar, I've fallen down a mountain, I almost had the tip of my thingy cut off, I've been greasing up the High Priest all night, and now I'm hanging upside down in a dungeon.
I really have to pee--
The only one who thinks you're chosen is you, so shut up already!
Guard! I have to pee! Now!
I hate you.
I think he hit me.
Hey! There's two of us!
And his friend! Don't forget his friend!
Okay, you think that actually makes anybody work harder? It just makes them resent you. Is that what you want?
Can I just ask when lunch is?
Where're we going?
Is that compulsory? Because I saw one when I first got here and it made me a little sick--
Ow! Why don't you try using your words for a change?
See the High Priest? I know him.
That's Eema! And Maya! I know them!
We have to do something! Somebody has to stop it.
We can't let them do this!
He seizes the opportunity.
A sign! It's a sign! The Chosen One comes!
I know him, too.
Hello, Eema.
Eema, you're my woman! You hear me?
Really? It's okay?
Then how about this?
More oil?
Yeah, just about-- I guess so. The Hebrews are going to lead us to the sea and we can get boats from there. We can trade all this stuff everybody gave us for the trip home.
I don't think I should be the leader. Nobody's listening to me.
Come back to the village sometime.
Hee-ya!
Come on. People are watching.
Hey! Wait your turn! There's a line here, buddy!
I'd kill you.
No, I saw you eat the Forbidden Fruit.
Good one, Marlak.
They're bringing out the women.
I see your sister, Eema--
Zing.
We need to talk.
You really ate the fruit?

You don't eat the fruit! That's been the number one rule from the beginning of time. Since the Great Turtle climbed from the sea with the Earth on his back, drank the ocean, pooped out the mountains and the first man fell from the stars.
Whatever. You're screwed now.
You're cursed, man, and if you stay here then we'll all be cursed. You have to leave.
Up to you. From now on you're completely on your own.
You should probably get going now.
And some of the guys got together and they want you to have this bow.
You'd better get moving.
--Or gatherer--
You're both idiots!
Because of you?
Zed looks at oh, who suddenly becomes very interested in an imaginary piece of loincloth lint.
--better, in fact, because having a partner would just slow me down.
looks around the forest clearing for subtle signs.
Did you just shoot my cow?
He's a farmer; I'm a herdsman.
My brother, Cain. I am called Abel.
What does it look like? We're farmers.
You're a suck, is what you are.
You are called suck.
"God looked on my sacrifice with  FAVOR--"
Okay, is he a total suck or what?
You think you're so superior to everyone else.
Really? Let's see how good you are at getting your ass kicked.
No! This smug asshole insulted you and I want him to take it back.
Take it back!
What?!
Replies.Didascalie: (turns on him sharply, still holding the bloody  ROCK)

Replies.Reply: Yeah.
Maybe I should throw some dirt on him-- keep him warm 'til he wakes up.
This is bad. This is really bad.
You could've stopped me! There's two of you and only one of me.
You calling me a murderer?
It was an accident!
Right?
Okay-- yeah-- good. But it might be better if we don't mention the "accident" to anyone. People might get the wrong idea. Understand?
I like you guys. You're all right.
I think you should come with me.
They're wheels, numbskull. They make the cart roll.
Hail, Father.
Can these guys stay for supper?
I bring strangers who would sojourn with us this night.
Abel? Haven't seen him. I thought he was with you.
You guys see him?
I think that was yesterday.
That might've been Boaz---
Hey, we're brothers, we argue sometimes- it's not that big a deal.
Okay! What am I-- his keeper? Get off my back, will you?
It's been the same damn thing my whole life.
Yeah, hey-- where's everybody going?
Good luck.
I said good luck. I'm really worried about him.
Yeah, I am. I just have to finish toiling over here, then I'm right behind you.
Now listen, I'm getting out of here, and you better come with me.
Because when they find him and his head is all bashed in, they're going to start pointing fingers, and you guys are drifters, so they'll put two and two together and that makes--
Four! It makes four! Now stop asking so many questions and hop on. We gotta get out of here!
They're gaining on us!
Hah! They'll never catch us now!
Wow! What are the odds of that?!
Am I lucky or what?
We're gonna need some money.
Perhaps I can help.
Let me talk to the guy. Maybe I can make a deal with him. You guys wait here.
So what are we lookin' at here?
Hey! Come here. I think we worked something out.
Wait! I know these guys!
Brothers!!
You know, you guys are lucky that sergeant is a friend of mine. I let him sodomize me once right after I got here and he's been real nice to me ever since.
wait a second. Do I detect a tone here?
Whoa whoa whoa! Hold a grudge much? That was like a fortnight ago.
Give me a break! I was dealing with the death of a close family member and I needed some space.
Now, you guys hungry? Watch this.
That's the kind of love I'm talkin' about.
You're gonna love Sodom. Trust me.
Hey, what happens in Sodom, stays in Sodom.
You know, if you guys are staying you should join the guards. The pay's not great, but there's tons of perks. I'm telling you, it's the only way to go.
Come on, I'll introduce you to the captain.
Pretty much. We just look for troublemakers and kick the living shit out of 'em.

If we see a thief or a pickpocket, we just slap him around-- maybe cut off a finger or an ear, or the tip of his nose, lower lip-- anything you can just grab and slice in one fluid motion-- then we take our share of the loot and let him go.
Harsh times, brother. We're in the middle of a famine. People are starving. If we don't get some rain soon, it could get ugly.
Then we'll get to start kicking ass big time.
Beat it, you filthy beggar!
Yeah, well, just remember, it's the palace that pays you, not the people.
The Princess Inanna. She's totally hot, but don't even think about it.
Because she's royalty and you're scum?
To the temple. Let's go.
You have to see this.
Everybody will be there.
Oh yeah. Uh huh. Uh huh.
It's pretty self-explanatory.
Her wish is my command.
The three of us are inseparable.
I wouldn't know.- I'm just a guard because my "brother" didn't pull any strings with his friends in the royal court.
Just like Abel. I oughta just bash your head in--
Yeah, sure. Have a nice orgy.
Should've invited me to the party.
For the crimes of blasphemy--
Shut up! For these and other crimes they may not actually have done yet but we're pretty sure they were thinking about, the prisoners will be stoned to death.
Anything to say before the sentence is carried out?
Okay! Stop! Halt! Hold it! This isn't working.
What?
Him?
He's just a kid!
All right! All right! We'll try it. Kid! Grab a rock.
Okay, everybody on this side now!
Can't we just stone them a little?
At your service, my lady. Anytime, anywhere.
Thank you, your majesty.
Your Highness, with all due respect, those were "Woos." They love you. They were "wooing" you.
Just doing my duty.
Tough guy, huh? You want a piece of me? Get ready to have your head bashed in!
Nice move!
Peace--- brother.
My brother is angry because God looked on my sacrifice with favor.
Why are you dragging them into this? What do they know? They're morons.
Superior-er than you.
Yeah? Bring it!
Make me!
Woooo! Woooo! Yeah!
Nape. Not that I remember. Never seen anybody-- anywhere-- anytime --
--mumble mumble mumble loving kindness.
Cain?
Right.
stare at the spectacle.
have no idea what's going on. Zed turns to the GUY NEXT TO  HIM.
watching curiously.
They look at each other. Someone has to say something.
Cain, my son!
Greetings, strangers. I am called Adam and you are welcome to share the fruits of our toil.
Where is thy brother, Abel?
Your sister Lilith said she saw him in the field with you.
No, this day. She said you both made offerings.
No, you and Abel. She said it looked like you were arguing.
I fear the worst for Abel. I am sorely vexed.
For my sin the ground is cursed.
It's the way of the world.
You are welcome to stay the night and lay with my daughter Lilith.
She is without a husband, and as the Lord has said, thou shalt be fruitful and multiply.
You may share the bed of my son Seth.
Cain!
To look for Abel.
What did you say?
You're not coming?
I multiplied with a sheep.
My thingie smells like lamb chops.
Oooh, listen to this one.
Want to see a trick?
My bed is small but you're welcome to share it. It's the way of my people.
I don't like men.
I like girls.
I'm attracted to women.
I like to have sex with other women.
After him!
Two silver pieces.
Next up, an unusual item-- looks like a Caucasian-- he's big, he's strong, he's a good breeder, so I'm going to start at                                               100        gold minas.
Oh.
Just a little.
I'm sorry! It was an accident.
I'm sorry.
We were sold to the palace. But I won't serve these people! I'd rather die!
What are you doing here?
Have you joined them?
What happened to him?
He has no idea what he's doing, does he?
No, it's fine. I understand. This really explains a lot about you that I didn't get before.
Oh?
Okay.
I'll listen to you.
You interested in some slaves?
You have money?
Look, pal, money talks and bullshit walks. I don't have time for looky-
All right! Next up is a twofer--
You're breaking my heart here. How about forty? Do I hear forty?
Thirty-five? Thirty?
Yes! Sold to Sheikh Hassan for                                  30 gold minas!
Have a good time in the salt mines, boys.
Why?
Knock it off! Don't make me come in there!
Take the slaves!
No. Let the desert have them.
Tend to the slaves. We leave for Sodom before daybreak.
Stand still, wench! I want to see what's under that skirt.
That was no accident!
Try using a hot poker. That they understand.
By order of the King, the sentence has been commuted.
It is the judgement of our most merciful King that the prisoners are to be enslaved to toil at hard labor until they die of exhaustion or starvation.
All is in readiness, Majesty.
Yes, sir.
Faster!
Get in line! Now! Move!
To watch the sacrifice. The King demands it.
Hey, Dad? We making a burnt offering?
I don't see the sheep.
Uh-- is this like a magic trick?
Okay, if this is because I didn't clean up my tent, you can stop now.
All right, this isn't funny anymore!
I'm telling mom!
He's nuts! I'm telling you-- he's totally lost it.
Best dad in all the land, everyone!
He wants to know where you're from.
Yeah, God just forgot to tell anyone else. we're having a war with someone like every five minutes.
Here we go again--
Okay, what did I tell you-- nuts?
I'm coming with you.
You're going to Sodom, right?
Yeah, whatever. If I show you how to get there, will you buy me a bottle of wine?
Fine. Then we'll just stand here.
Me and my friends sneak in on the weekends. We hang around, pick up on the babes, drink some wine, get wasted on killer hash--
Thanks, Grandpa, but I've been smoking for four harvests, so I think I'm okay.
You just have to knock. They always let me in.
Go ahead.
Hey! Anybody there? Hello?
You gonna make me?
You and what army?
Yeah!
Like I'm really gonna tell my father I came with you to Sodom.
Just fucking nuts.
Hey, babe. Ever made it with a circumcised guy?
Is she with you? I did not realize that. Sorry.
Yes, Isaac. As God has commanded me.
The Lord will provide the sheep.
Nothing.
No, I was going to sacrifice him.
By what right do you interfere?
Verily, thou wast sent to stay my hand by the Eternal one, blessed be He.
I am Abraham, son of Terah of the house of Nahor.
The tents of my kinsmen lie just beyond. There will you find all that you desire. Come.
My brothers, let us give thanks unto God for staying my hand on the mountain this day.
And for the bounty which He hath bestowed unto us.
Friends, whence comest thou?
Thou comest not from the cities of the plain? From Sodom or Gomorrah?
The Lord has cursed them for their abomination.
They bow down before false Gods and worship graven images.
The men of the city are weak and soft, fat with rich food, intoxicated by strong drink.
Their women are whores; their shameless lust knows no bounds.
Walk not the path of Sodom! For surely will the Lord send his holy fire to destroy the city and all who dwell within, to smite them and all their seed for their iniquity.
Accompany me.

Their fate is sealed. But for my faith and devotion, the self-same God has given unto me the whole of this land, from the Jordan to the Negev, from the river of Egypt to the great Euphrates. This did He grant to me and my seed.
For eternity.
I and my kinsmen have vanquished our enemies by the mighty hand of the Lord, praised be He.
Therefore, to signify my Covenant with the One True God, on this night will I circumcise the flesh of my foreskin, and of you and every male who dwells hereby.
we will grasp the foreskins of our penises and cut therefrom the extra flesh.
No. So it shall be written, so it shall be done.
Get my big knife.
Death to the idolators!
What am I? Chopped liver?
Hey, wait up!
Stop!
Halt!
They were banging on the gate.
Should we wake the Sergeant?
What's this now?
You don't want to do that. He gets pretty mean when you wake him.
BLOODY HELL! WHAT'S GOING ON OUT  THERE!
Who the hell screamed?
I thought it was a woman.
You don't look like a woman, but maybe you want to kiss me anyway.
By morning you'll be sorry you were born.
Get my big stick. I'll deal with the fat one first.
Welcome to Sodom.
Line up!
The Princess isn't eating?
Your concern is enviable.

Careful, Princess. You may be my step-daughter, but these are dangerous times and those are dangerous words. I weep for the suffering of my people, but the spirit of rebellion is alive in the city and if necessary I will crush it with every means at my disposal.
For the good of everyone who enjoys the favor of the throne.
Six sacrifices in the last ten days and still no rain. What do the entrails predict?
What does it mean?
What does it mean for us?
How did you become High Priest?
Poverty has a bitter taste, but it's the flavor they were born to.
Observe, my dear. It seems the least you could do, since it was you who lured him to his death.
What is that idiot doing?
Could it be? Is he truly chosen?
Imbecile!
Are they booing me? How dare they!
Yes, two, followers of the Chosen One, discovered by this loyal soldier.
And one more to demonstrate our own faith and charity.
In supplication to the Gods, for the love of the People, we offer a humble sacrifice to the sacred temple fire-- our own step-
For the good of the people.
Wouldn't I? If you like, I could arrange for you to join her.
How long did you think I'd tolerate your insolence?
Burn her.-
I knew I could depend on your loyalty.
Assholes.
I find it hard to eat when so many are hungry.
And besides, I'm so fat.
Yes, I am, mother! Those new linen pants you got me from Egypt make my ass look just huge.
Why not? Everybody else is starving-- present company excluded.
For the good of the people.
Whatever. I'm just so incredibly bored.
Isn't that the idiot who was standing up in the street?
Can the Gods really be so cruel?
Good. See that he's bathed and dressed, then bring him to me.
This should be amusing.
Come to me.
Beautiful, isn't it? You can see Gomorrah just over the hill.
They're called the "twin cities."
And what do you think? Am I evil?
I have body issues.
My eyes are brown.
I don't know. I just find you--
Yes, finally a man who has the courage to question the order of things--- a man chosen by the Gods to do something great.
I know why. To bring you here-- to this place-- to me.
Come.
I want you to enter the Holy of Holies.
That's the Holy of Holies-- you have to go in there and talk to the Gods.
So they say, but the only one who ever goes in is the High Priest.
Because you were chosen? If the Gods wanted you dead they would have killed you already.
This is what you've been chosen for! To speak to the Gods and plead with them not to destroy the city. Then come back out and tell me what it's like inside.
Do you always follow the rules?
Do this for me.
I told him not to go in.
I didn't intend for this to happen.
What now? More virgins to sacrifice?
I'll see you all in Hell.
You're not fat--
Well, you can't keep starving yourself.
I don't think that's cruel. It's just practical. If everybody was rich, who'd wait on us?
There's a depraved thought. You're so delightfully low. Absolute filth.
You wouldn't dare!
O El, lord of Heaven and Earth; Baal, the Sublime; Shapash, goddess of the sun; Hadad, the storm god, over-ruling son of Dagon, the bountiful, god of grain, our earthly sustenance--
We come before you in humble supplication, invoking your blessing, the sweet rain which waters our fields, enriches the harvest, fills our storehouses, makes mighty the house of Ish-ka-bi-
--and feeds us, your children, with the bounty of your grace.
Accept now this humble sacrifice to the power and glory of your magnificence.
For the love of the Gods and the glory of their Creation, the great dome of Heaven, the green growing Earth, we commit this maiden to your Holy Fire.
Well, the liver is streaked with gray-- that's not a favorable sign--
Usually it means that the sheep took very good care of itself, probably sticking to a high-fiber diet of grass and hay.
Well, it could mean either a surprise visit from a former friend or sweetheart-- or that you're going on a long sea voyage!
Because I'm your brother?
Perhaps it's not time for a new High Priest. Aaaahh!
And let that be a warning to you.
Or a fire-ball.
You there! Golden boy! Rub me with oil.
Then maybe you'd rather I speak to your commander and have you whipped to within an inch of your life. Or perhaps I whip you myself? How would you like that?
I'd say so.
More.
No! More oil! Much more, you insolent dolt!
That's good. Now rub it in.
Do it!
Mmmmm, I love it. The sweet scent of precious oil. The oily--
Mnum imam. I have an idea. Why don't we go back to my place and see what's under all that paint?
My life is devoted to the service of the Gods and the good of the people. I take nothing for myself.
Yes, it is. It's just so-- lonely.
Come, I'll show you.
Gods-- a place so ineffably sacred, so powerful, that to enter is instant death for any mortal.
it needs no cleaning.
I assume they finished it, then the Gods descended.
I just told you! To enter is instant death! Only I can go in and only once a year after very elaborate purification rituals and days of special prayers and offerings.
Fine! Enough! I'm sorry I brought it up. Let's go.
Move. Move.
Seize them!
I don't-- I suppose it's possible-
We implore the great Gods of heaven to show us a sign that we may honor your divine will and be worthy of your blessing.
Yes! Well and truly, the Gods are with us--
Burn them! Now!
May the balm of this healing oil soothe your journey through the sacred fire!
Don't fight it! It's the will of the Gods!
What did you say?
Still not getting it.
You don't think what?
I forgot.
Guards!
Keep away!
No! The Gods demand a sacrifice!
No! A duck would not be good!
Hot!
She glances at Zed again, but this time a slight smile crosses her lips.
He's picking a virgin.
To throw into the fire.
Offering to the Gods. There's a famine going on. If we don't make a good sacrifice, it won't rain.
Duh.
Why? Is he your lover?
I serve the royal family-- little of this, little of that. I've been a palace eunuch since I was nine years old.
They cut off your testicles.
Trust me, after a while you don't even miss them.
The Eunuch just shrugs, apparently not that weird to him.
Perhaps it's time for a new High Priest.
Majesty, there's talk of revolution in the streets. Grain and oil are scarce, prices are high, starving peasants are pouring into the city looking for food--

Majesty, with respect, whether he's chosen or not is no longer the issue. To kill him now, given the public mood, could inflame the situation enough to prompt a radical "regime change," if you take my meaning.
watch it, jerk!
She leaves him. A haze of heavily scented incense hangs in the air.
Do you find me attractive?
Yeah. That's me.
Replies.Didascalie: (considers explaining but just lets it go)

Replies.Reply: And the murder of my brother Abel--
The King, Queen, High Priest and Royal Ministers observe the stoning from their vantage point above the square. Princess Inanna refuses to look.
STONE THEM!
Yes! Ooh, me! Pick me! Me!
Replies.Didascalie: (some eagerly raising their hands and waving like school children)

Replies.Reply: Yeah! What's he got against kids?
The Chosen One! A sign from the Gods!
Up to Heaven, I guess. That's how tall they usually build 'em.
Incredible erection.
The tower.
See, the Egyptians are working on an entirely different concept.
Exactly.
We worked on the Tower of Babel.
Like a pyramid?
Wow. Far out. Yet timeless in a way.
Want some water?
I guess you know everybody, don't you.
That's far enough, slave.
The whole crowd watches in amazement as the 250                 foot scaffolding slowly collapses and crashes to the ground, bringing tons of debris with it, sending up a great cloud of dust.
Everyone goes silent, stunned by the incredible turn of events. All eyes turn to Zed and Oh, now standing before them on the center stage of the temple.
